headline: RTX awarded FAA contract to deploy next-generation surveillance radars for National Airspace System
summary: Collins Aerospace, an RTX (NYSE: RTX) business, has been awarded a $438 million contract by the Federal Aviation Administration to support the Radar System Replacement program, a cornerstone of the agency's effort to modernize the U.S. National Airspace System. The program is a key part of the Department of Transportation's Brand New Air Traffic Control System.

The program is a key part of the Department of Transportation's Brand New Air Traffic Control System.

headline: Global Defense Stocks Gain After Trump Ousts Venezuela's Maduro
summary: President Trump’s intervention in Venezuela has spurred concerns about mounting global insecurity—and given weapon makers a boost.    In the U.S., shares in Northrop Grumman and Lockheed Martin rose in morning trading, recently adding 2.

headline: Why Venezuela Is Boosting Defense Stocks—in Europe
summary: Shares of defense contractors were rising following the surprise capture of Venezeulean leader Nicolás Maduro.

headline: Defense Stocks Boosted by U.S. Intervention in Venezuela as Geopolitical Risk Rises
summary: European defense companies jumped in early European trading after the U.S. ousted Venezuelan leader Nicolas Maduro, while U.S. peers are expected to also trade higher when the market opens.

summary: Global defense stocks have soared following the overthrow of Venezuelan president Maduro.
